import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function SignUp() { let [signUpData, setSignUpData]= useState( { firstname: "", lastname: "", email: "", password: "", username: "", } ) function handleInput(e) { setSignUpData({...signUpData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } function handleSignUpInput () { const newSignUpData = { id: signUpData.id, firstname: signUpData.firstname, lastname: signUpData.lastname, email: signUpData.email, password: signUpData.password, username: signUpData.username, } } return (

); }
